sentences.english: Why didn't you take TOEFL, IELTS or SAT tests?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼沒有考雅思或是託福，賽達考試？

sentences.english: In addition, IELTS is generally not suitable for people under 16 years of age.
sentences.chinese: 另外，雅思考試一般不適合16歲以下的考生。

sentences.english: What level of English must a candidate have insgroupsto apply for IELTS?
sentences.chinese: 申請雅思考試的考生必須具備什麼樣的英語水平？

sentences.english: It never occurred to me to take advantage of you.
sentences.chinese: 鄭州雅思學校我決沒有想到過要佔你便宜。

sentences.english: Who will handle complaints and suggestions regarding IELTS test?
sentences.chinese: 何處負責接收有關雅思考試的投訴和建議？

sentences.english: The IELTS also has a speaking section, unlike the paper version of the TOEFL.
sentences.chinese: 雅思還有一個口語部分，與託福的全部筆試截然不同。

sentences.english: An increasing number of universities in the United States also accept IELTS.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多的美國院校也開始接受雅思考試成績。

sentences.english: I think they mostly tend to insist on good IELTS scores.
sentences.chinese: 我想它們大都傾向於堅持雅思考試的高分。

sentences.english: We are directly involved in IELTS and BULATS.
sentences.chinese: 我們直接參與雅思和職業外語水平考試。

sentences.english: Eddieyue opinion is also the same, and prepared the resignation letter to the ielts.
sentences.chinese: 偉文的意見亦是一樣，並準備了辭職信給雅思。

sentences.english: Any idea how often the IELTS exam is held?
sentences.chinese: 你知道雅思考試多久舉行一次嗎？

sentences.english: Computer-based IELTS test is introduced in a few countries world-wide.
sentences.chinese: 雅思考試的機考模式在全球一些國家推出。

sentences.english: Practice giving answers to a complete IELTS test using only one barrel of pencil points.
sentences.chinese: 要練習只用一管鉛筆頭答完雅思考試的所有試題。

sentences.english: First of all, he aske me about my academic performance and the score of IELTS.
sentences.chinese: 首先他問我的學業成績，以及雅思等關於學習的情況。

sentences.english: IELTS in Vienna, Austria was described by SVB as follows. Many thanks for remembering and sharing.
sentences.chinese: 奧地利維也納雅思考試，由SVB提供，非常感謝。

sentences.english: There are various reasons why students do not achieve  excellent marks in IELTS test.
sentences.chinese: 學生在雅思考試中無法取得高分是有諸多原因的。

definition: (old) thanks to your lucky influence (polite reply to health inquiries)
TOEFL/Test of English as a Foreign Language
TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication)
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to sit an entrance exam for a graduate program
